to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: CVS user name changed?
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA512

Hi Kirk. I didn't get a password prompt; the login was rejected before it got to that point. 
On Thu, Jun 14, 2007 at 08:17:20PM -0400, Kirk Reiser wrote:
> Hi Igor:  Did you put the password 'please' in?  It certainly hasn't
> changed.
> 
>   Kirk
> 
> --
